items.sentence: I\'m the only one here who really knows Tom.
Tom wasn\'t able to do what he needed to do.
Tom wasn\'t really paying attention to Mary.
My grandfather can\'t walk without his cane.
I want to know exactly what you said to Tom.
I want to know if you have any time to help.
Tom gave Mary more credit than she deserved.
I\'m not pleased with how things turned out.
I\'m supposed to speak French in the office.
Tom pretended to be an undercover policeman.
I\'ve got something interesting to show you.
I\'ve got to get back to the office by 2:30.
I\'ve had it with you and your stupid ideas.
Let\'s not tell anybody that we\'re married.
Tom didn\'t invite me to his birthday party.
Tom didn\'t know Mary had agreed to do that.
Tom didn\'t realize how late it was getting.
I\'m the only one with a key to this locker.
Tom is the most handsome man I\'ve ever met.
I wish Tom had done what we asked him to do.
